name: Windswept Hills
description: Rolling green hills stretch as far as the eye can see, dotted with clusters of wildflowers and ancient standing stones. The wind carries the scent of wild grass and distant rain.

common.name: wild_berries
common.description: Sweet berries that can substitute for rations in a pinch.

common.name: granite_chips
common.description: Small pieces of granite useful for basic tool maintenance.

uncommon.name: hill_flowers
uncommon.description: Rare wildflowers prized by herbalists for their healing properties.

rare.name: windstone
rare.description: A mystical stone that hums with the power of endless wind.

random_events.name: Lost Shepherd
random_events.description: A young shepherd has lost his flock in the hills. His sheep have scattered, and wolves prowl nearby.

help_find_sheep.description: The grateful shepherd gives you provisions and his blessing.

offer_protection.description: You escort the boy safely back to his village.

random_events.name: Ancient Stone Circle
random_events.description: You discover a circle of ancient standing stones humming with mysterious energy. Runes are carved deep into their surfaces.

study_runes.description: You decipher fragments of an ancient language, gaining insight into the past.

touch_stones.description: Mystical energy courses through you - painful but empowering.

random_events.name: Scenic Vista
random_events.description: You reach the crest of a particularly tall hill and are rewarded with a breathtaking view of the surrounding countryside.

rest_and_admire.description: The beautiful vista lifts your spirits and refreshes your body.

scout_ahead.description: You gain valuable knowledge of the paths ahead.

special_locations.name: Hermit's Cave
special_locations.description: A wise hermit lives in a cave decorated with painted symbols and hanging chimes.

rest_spots.name: Shepherd's Hut
rest_spots.description: An abandoned stone hut that once sheltered shepherds during storms.

rest_spots.name: Hilltop Grove
rest_spots.description: A small grove of trees provides some protection from wind.
